content.p: Once you arrive at the University of Nottingham, you will need to log on to our campus Wi-Fi (eduroam) using your university email address and password. This will confirm your in-person (on-campus) registration. For eduroam, your username is your university email address: Getting connected You should log in within the first 3 weeks of your course start date. We will then complete your in-person registration. If you live off campus or in private halls/accommodation, you will need to come on to campus for your in-person registration to be confirmed. Once you have completed both online and in-person (on-campus) registration, you will receive an email to your university email account to confirm your registration is complete. If you have issues with connecting to Wi-Fi, please contact the Smart Bar or IT Service Desk. If you are having problems completing registration or have any questions please visit our student enquiry centre or contact us.
